name: Snake Strike
description:
Early demo version.
Use arrow keys and Spacebar to strike.
Esc or Tab opens pause menu with stats.

Wind your snake body around then strike to catch the fleeing prey.

Snake Speeds up every 20 points.

If you hit a wall or the snake body, it counts as a death and a black circle appears. The menu keeps track of your deaths, but you can keep playing.

To Do:
-fix strike pathing (align to grid instead of direct diagonal)
-better death/game over?
-change fleeing prey to animated sprites, bugs probably
